data.text:
B1: JAL return address bug — HW saves JAL's own PC to R15 instead of PC+1.

Suspects: regbnk.vhd:102-103 saves p_id_wb_iaddr_3 (JAL's own PC). ANEM.vhd:272 feeds PC_IN without +1 adder.
Fix: Add +1 adder before PC_IN in ANEM.vhd:272, or change regbnk.vhd to use p_id_wb_iaddr_3 + 1.
Impact: JAL/JR subroutine calls cause infinite loops because JR returns to JAL itself instead of the instruction after the delay slot.
